Creation of the Landing page for a start-up project flopi.me

We have developed one-page site for a start-up project of the mobile dating application pegged to NFT. Website design and coding were completed during 1 day due to the short deadlines set by the customers; this site was detailed and brought to its ideal version within 3-4 days.
Design: Egor Popov
Website coding: Gulp, Functionality/Services: JS, Design: Figma.
